title: Tata Motors sales rise 11.5% to 77,521 units in April
description: In April, Tata Motors reported an 11.5% year-on-year increase in total wholesales to 77,521 units. Domestic dispatches surged 12% to 76,399 units. Passenger vehicle sales rose by 2% to 47,983 units, while commercial vehicle sales spiked by 31% to 29,538 units compared to April 2023.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
